name: Imorich Cookie Cream Ice Cream
description:
IMORICH Cookie Cream ice cream’s mouthwatering flavour captures the very essence of the romantic French countryside taking you on a journey with every bite.
The take on the old favourite cookie and cream ice cream, with its rich creamy sweetness combined with crunchy chocolate cookies strewn throughout, is a perfect dessert and a wicked indulgence.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
